statements: SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE behavior_pattern = 'frequent';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference = 'vegetarian' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_pattern FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY behavior_pattern ASC, customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference = 'Sports' AND behavior_pattern = 'Active' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE behavior_pattern = 'Loyal' ORDER BY preference ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_pattern FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(preference) AS preference_count FROM customer_preferences GROUP BY customer_id HAVING preference_count > 3;

SELECT customer_id, preference, behavior_pattern FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference IN ('Music', 'Books') AND behavior_pattern NOT IN ('Aggressive', 'Reckless') ORDER BY customer_id ASC, preference DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value1';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_patterns WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT behavior_pattern_1, behavior_pattern_2 FROM customer_behavior_patterns WHERE customer_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_2 = 'value'
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preference_1 DESC
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%pattern%'
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_patterns ORDER BY behavior_pattern_1 ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_name = 'favorite_color';
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE behavior_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_item FROM RecommendationHistory ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS total_recommendations FROM RecommendationHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_recommendations > 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_value = 'High';
SELECT behavior_date, behavior_type FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, recommendation_date, recommendation_item FROM RecommendationHistory WHERE recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM RecommendationHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_recommendations > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT preference_category, preference_value FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, pattern_description, pattern_date FROM BehaviorPatterns ORDER BY pattern_date DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM UserActivity WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY preference_category DESC, preference_value ASC
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM Recommendations WHERE customer_id = 10
SELECT pattern_description FROM BehaviorPatterns WHERE pattern_date >= '2022-01-01' AND pattern_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM UserActivity ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT preference_category FROM CustomerPreferences
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_category FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_value = 'High';
SELECT * FROM behavior_patterns ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Food';
SELECT pattern_description FROM behavior_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
